articles.author: Liz Lee, Laurie Chen, Xiuhao Chen
articles.description: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen called for an "essential" rebalancing of trade ties with China during a tense summit on Thursday with President Xi Jinping, saying ties stood at an "inflection point", according to a pool report.
articles.title: EU's von der Leyen says China ties are at 'inflection point' at tense summit
